original_text: ‘Nobody has ever given anything to God, so that God had a debt to pay back to them.’ 11: See Job 41:11. ‘Nobody has ever given anything to God,
korean_text: 누가 주께 먼저 드려서 갚으심을 받겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Nobody has ever given anything to God
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 하나님께 아무것도 드린 적이 없다

sentences.original_text: so that God had a debt to pay back to them
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 하나님께서 그들에게 갚아야 할 빚이 있었다

sentences.original_text: Nobody has ever given anything to God
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 하나님께 아무것도 드린 적이 없다
